name: places/ChIJ6fbtovfzwokR0AOBLLRIEJ0
adrFormatAddress: 4880 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Worse mechanic shop ever been to I've been driving over 20yrs Roberto wanted to charge me $1500 to fix one part and didn't guarantee me the car would be fixed then said i needed a new car and started naming cars i should buy that im wasting money on this car thats not worth it is he a mechanic or a car salesman then over charged me for oil change and didn't fix the other things I asked for so i took my car to another mechanic shop down the block they ran a diagnostic fixed 5 parts for less then $1100 which fixed the problem I was having and told me my car was perfectly fine

originalText.text: Any time my motorcycle wants to be loaded with petrol, I've always been racing to this gas station. I'm their daily customers already. I'm also a friend to their employees because of their excellent support. Keep up with the good job!

I do my NYC inspection every year and for me it work pretty fast.
good location. 204st Broadway
early morning.
last time it took me about 10 to 20 minutes in and out.

Good service.

originalText.text: I went to get gas there for the first time as I was in a rush. I have a small car and always pay between 30-33 bucks for a full tank. I paid with my debit card, man didn’t give me a receipt. I got to work and I realized they charged me 50 for regular gas. I have a 2015 veloster, tell me how is it possible to pay $50 with a car like that?

I have a 2015 veloster, tell me how is it possible to pay $50 with a car like that?

originalText.text:
The location is terrible; right in front of a bus stop, way too many pedestrians everywhere, and for whatever reason the gas station further complicates things by having parked cars all over the place. Depending on the time of day you show up, you might have to play a very delicate and slow game of twist-around-the-cars to be able to get to the gas pumps.

This would be three stars if not for the simple reason that the gas station does not charge differently for using cash or card. On top of that, their prices tend to be quite competitive for the area, and they almost always tend to be lower than others. For this reason alone they get a big plus. I keep coming back simply for that reason alone, and its the only reason I put up with pedestrian/parked car tango every time.

Get rid of the parked cars blocking the whole place honestly and this place would be near perfect.
